verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%> It is all <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3585>lies<s%> and <S%H6563>robbery.<s%> The <S%H2964>prey<s%> <S%H4185>doesn't<s%> depart.

The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7752>whip,<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7494>rattling<s%> of <S%H212>wheels,<s%> <S%H1725>prancing<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H7540>bounding<s%> <S%H4818>chariots,<s%>

the <S%H6571>horseman<s%> <S%H5927>mounting,<s%> and the <S%H1300>flashing<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear,<s%> and a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2491>slain,<s%> and a <S%H3514>great<s%> heap of <S%H6297>corpses,<s%> and there is no <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H6297>bodies.<s%> They <S%H3782>stumble<s%> on their <S%H1472>bodies,<s%>

because of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of the <S%H2183>prostitution<s%> of the <S%H2896>alluring<s%> <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of <S%H3785>witchcraft,<s%> who <S%H4376>sells<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> through her <S%H2183>prostitution,<s%> and <S%H4940>families<s%> through her <S%H3785>witchcraft.<s%>

<S%H5002>"Behold,<s%> I am against you," says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "and I will <S%H1540>lift<s%> your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> over your <S%H6440>face.<s%> I will <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> your <S%H4626>nakedness,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> your <S%H7036>shame.<s%>
I will <S%H7993>throw<s%> abominable <S%H8251>filth<s%> on <S%H5034>you,<s%> and make you vile, and will <S%H7760>set<s%> you a <S%H7210>spectacle.<s%>

It will happen that all those who <S%H7200>look<s%> at you will <S%H5074>flee<s%> from <S%H559>you,<s%> and say, <S%H5210><s%> 'Nineveh is laid <S%H7703>waste!<s%> Who will <S%H5110>mourn<s%> for <S%H370>her?<s%>' Where will I <S%H1245>seek<s%> comforters for <S%H5162>you?<s%>"

Are you <S%H3190>better<s%> than <S%H4996>No<s%> - <S%H527>Amon,<s%> who was <S%H3427>situated<s%> among the <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> who had the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H2426>her;<s%> whose rampart was the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and her <S%H2346>wall<s%> was of the <S%H3220>sea?<s%>
<S%H3568>Cush<s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were her <S%H369>boundless<s%> <S%H6109>strength.<s%> <S%H6316>Put<s%> and <S%H3864>Libya<s%> were her <S%H5833>helpers.<s%>

Yet was she carried <S%H1473>away.<s%> She <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%> Her young <S%H5768>children<s%> also were dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> and they <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for her honorable <S%H3513>men,<s%> and all her great <S%H1419>men<s%> were <S%H7576>bound<s%> in <S%H2131>chains.<s%>
You also will be <S%H7937>drunken.<s%> You will be <S%H5956>hidden.<s%> You also will <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> because of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

All your <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> will be like fig <S%H8384>trees<s%> with the <S%H1061>first-ripe<s%> figs: if they are <S%H5128>shaken,<s%> they <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H398>eater.<s%>

<S%H5971>Behold,<s%> your troops in your <S%H7130>midst<s%> are <S%H802>women.<s%> The <S%H8179>gates<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> are set <S%H6605>wide<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> to your <S%H341>enemies.<s%> The <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> your <S%H1280>bars.<s%>

<S%H7579>Draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H4692>siege.<s%> <S%H2388>Strengthen<s%> your <S%H4013>fortresses.<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> into the <S%H2916>clay,<s%> and <S%H7429>tread<s%> the <S%H2563>mortar.<s%> Make the brick <S%H4404>kiln<s%> <S%H2388>strong.<s%>

There the <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H2719>you.<s%> The sword will cut you <S%H3772>off.<s%> It will <S%H398>devour<s%> you like the <S%H3218>grasshopper.<s%> <S%H3513>Multiply<s%> like <S%H3218>grasshoppers.<s%> <S%H3513>Multiply<s%> like the <S%H697>locust.<s%>
You have <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H7402>merchants<s%> more than the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>skies.<s%> The <S%H3218>grasshopper<s%> <S%H6584>strips,<s%> and flees <S%H5774>away.<s%>

Your <S%H4502>guards<s%> are like the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> and your <S%H2951>officials<s%> like the swarms of <S%H1462>locusts,<s%> which <S%H2583>settle<s%> on the <S%H1448>walls<s%> on a <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>appears,<s%> they flee <S%H5074>away,<s%> and their <S%H4725>place<s%> is not <S%H3045>known<s%> where they <S%H335>are.<s%>

Your <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H5123>slumber,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%> Your <S%H117>nobles<s%> <S%H7931>lie<s%> <S%H5971>down.<s%> Your people are <S%H6335>scattered<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and there is no one to gather <S%H6908>them.<s%>

There is no <S%H3545>healing<s%> your <S%H7667>wound,<s%> for your <S%H4347>injury<s%> is <S%H2470>fatal.<s%> All who <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8088>report<s%> of you <S%H8628>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%> over <S%H5674>you;<s%> for who hasn't felt your <S%H8548>endless<s%> <S%H7451>cruelty?<s%>
